hero.headline: Welcome to Feel ABAC online order platform
hero.subheadline: Below is how to use our menu and ordering tools so you can get your meal with zero hassle.

instructions.title: Getting started
steps: Sign in with your student account to unlock the daily menu.
Review each category, pick your dishes, and select Burmese names if you prefer.
Reserve a pickup slot or head straight to the counter when your order is ready.
